name: London Relocation Consultancy
tag_list: relocation-services, relocation-agents, relocation-company, corporate-accommodation, serviced-apartments, personal-property-search, bespoke-property-searches
overview:
Internationally recognised London Relocation Consultancy is a leading London relocation agency with qualified specialists providing bespoke property searches for private clients and full relocation services for corporate clients. We have got access to the very best London properties including inaccessible off market residential and commercial properties in Central London. We are helping find family homes and investments by researching and sourcing properties that suites your criteria and closing transaction at the best value.

London Relocation Consultancy specialises in Central London serviced short stay accommodation. We offer a full range of premium hotel style apartments designed for your independent living in all areas of London. We currently have 600 apartments across London. Our clients are major banks, hedge funds, law firms, embassies and members of parliament.

We act exclusively for clients looking for properties in London by offering help, advice and benefit of our knowledge in the property market. London Relocation Consultancy provides one stop of tailor made services including full concierge services. We believe that high-level of personal attention creates the most successful relocation.

Whether you are looking for a new home or an investment our commitment is to find that perfect property at the right price to save your time and money and help the property search and move to be stress free. Our aim to bring you nothing but the best service.
